text:
http://500px.com, Toronto, Fulltime

500px is a photo community for premium photography (http://500px.com/popular). We value small teams, engineering-friendly culture, beautiful design and getting shit done.

Who we are looking Senior Android Developers to help us build cutting-edge, native Android apps that change how our four-million photographers take, share, view and license photography

What we offer:

- competitive salaries

- flexible work hours

- unlimited vacation

- free lunches

- medical insurance

- computer/laptop of your choice

Apply here: http://500px.com/jobs
